import React from 'react'; import {minutesToDuration} from '../utils/duration'; import {secondsToDuration} from '../utils/duration'; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; function LandingDisplay({data, stopHandler, playPause}){ return( <>
Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(data.focusTimer)}
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(data.breakTimer)}
)} export default LandingDisplay;
